collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (6 total Queries, 6 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql:
select *
        from tbl_users as tu, tbl_position as tp
        where tu.position = tp.posID
        and tu.firm = 1
        and tu.userID != 1

        from tbl_users as tu, tbl_position as tp
        where tu.position = tp.posID
        and tu.firm = 1
        and tu.userID != 1
